IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PRESERVE REPRODUCTIVE SERVICES, TO PROMOTE HEALTH AND WELLNESS AND TO ADVOCATE FOR QUALITY HEALTHCARE THROUGH GRANT MAKING AND EDUCATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PRESERVE REPRODUCTIVE SERVICES, TO PROMOTE HEALTH AND WELLNESS AND TO ADVOCATE FOR QUALITY HEALTHCARE THROUGH GRANT MAKING AND EDUCATION.
IRS990.Desc: COMMUNITY GRANT PROGRAM:CHF PROVIDES SUPPORT TO NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS THROUGH ITS COMMUNITY GRANTS PROGRAM. GRANT FUNDS ARE DIRECTED TO PROJECTS AND INITIATIVES THAT SUPPORT AND PROMOTE: HEALTHY LIVING, REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH, HEALTHY RELATIONSHIPS AND MENTAL, EMOTIONAL HEALTH, AND SAFETY NET SERVICES. GRANT FUNDS WERE PROVIDED TO 64 ORGANIZATIONS DURING FYE JUNE 30, 2023. GRANT FUNDING IS ALSO FOR HEALTH EQUITY PROJECTS INCLUDING PROJECTS IMPROVING THE SOCIAL DETERMINANTS OF HEALTH AS WELL AS ORAL HEALTH PROGRAMS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: FAMILY HEALTH EDUCATION:CHF DISTRIBUTED OVER 2,992 COPIES OF ITS HEALTH RESOURCE GUIDE FOR CLARK AND CHAMPAIGN COUNTIES TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC AND SOCIAL SERVICE OR HEALTH AGENCIES THAT SERVE THE PUBLIC. THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR THIS PUBLICATION. THE GUIDE WAS ALSO MAINTAINED AND UPDATED ON OUR WEBSITE AND IS SEARCHABLE AND DOWNLOADABLE. HEALTH EXPO '22 WAS HELD ON SEPTEMBER 28, 2022 WITH FREE HEALTH SCREENINGS AND HEALTH AND WELLNESS EXHIBITORS; MORE THAN 400 ATTENDED HEALTH EXPO '22. CHF ALSO PARTICIPATES IN MANY HEALTH FAIRS AND EXPOS PROVIDING "MY PLATES", IN ENGLISH AND SPANISH, TO ELEMENTARY AGED CHILDREN TO PROMOTE HEALTHY EATING HABITS AND PORTION CONTROL, AS WELL AS INFORMATION ON HEALTHY LIVING.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH EDUCATION AND INFORMATION:THROUGH ITS REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH EDUCATION, CHF PROVIDED COMPREHENSIVE SEXUALITY EDUCATION PROGRAMS TO MIDDLE AND HIGH SCHOOL YOUTH USING TRAINED AND CERTIFIED HEALTH EDUCATORS, SERVING 224 STUDENTS AT 3 DIFFERENT VENUES AS WELL AS VIRTUALLY. THE PURPOSE OF THIS EDUCATION IS TO IMPROVE ADOLESCENT SEXUAL HEALTH BY REDUCING THE INCIDENCE OF RISK TAKING SEXUAL BEHAVIORS IN TEENS, LOWERING UNPLANNED PREGNANCY RATES AND REDUCING THE NUMBER OF SEXUALLY TRANSMITTED INFECTIONS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: CHF PROVIDES CLINICAL REPRODUCTIVE SERVICES IN ITS PAVILION TO INCLUDE TUBAL LIGATIONS, VASECTOMIES AND CONTRACEPTIVE SHOTS.

InvstProgramRelatedOrgGrp.Desc: BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN FUND HELD BY SPRINGFIELD

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO PROVIDE CLINICAL SERVICES, PRIMARY REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH SERVICES AND OTHER HEALTH SERVICES NOT PROVIDED BY COMMUNITY MERCY HEALTH PARTNERS AND PROVIDE REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH AND WOMEN'S HEALTH EDUCATION AND INFORMATION.

ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES - ACCOUNTING STANDARDS REQUIRE THE EVALUATION OF TAX POSITIONS TAKEN, OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN, IN THE COURSE OF PREPARING THE FOUNDATION'S TAX RETURNS, TO DETERMINE WHETHER THE TAX POSITIONS ARE "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" OF BEING SUSTAINED BY THE APPLICABLE TAX AUTHORITY. THIS STATEMENT PROVIDES THAT A TAX BENEFIT FROM AN UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION MAY BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ONLY WHEN IT IS "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" THE POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION, INCLUDING RESOLUTION OF ANY RELATED APPEALS OR LITIGATION PROCESSES, BASED UPON THE TECHNICAL MERITS AND CONSIDERATION OF ALL AVAILABLE INFORMATION. ONCE THE RECOGNITION THRESHOLD IS MET, THE PORTION OF THE TAX BENEFIT THAT IS RECORDED REPRESENTS THE LARGEST AMOUNT OF TAX BENEFIT THAT IS GREATER THAN 50 PERCENT LIKELY TO BE REALIZED UPON SETTLEMENT WITH A TAXING AUTHORITY. BASED ON ITS REVIEW, MANAGEMENT DOES NOT BELIEVE THE FOUNDATION HAS TAKEN ANY MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS, INCLUDING ANY POSITION THAT WOULD PLACE THE FOUNDATION'S TAX-EXEMPT STATUS IN JEOPARDY, AS OF JUNE 30, 2023.
CHANGE IN BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN FUNDS HELD BY SPRINGFIELD FOUNDATION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF 3-4 DISINTERESTED MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES IS APPOINTED BY THE BOARD CHAIR. PROGRESS REPORT ON CEO GOALS IS REVIEWED, PERFORMANCE REVIEW SCORE SHEETS ARE COMPLETED INDIVIDUALLY BY MEMBERS, AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR PERFORMANCE IS REVIEWED AND COMPENSATION DETERMINED DURING A MEETING OF THE WHOLE COMMITTEE. COMPENSATION IS SET TAKING INTO ACCOUNT PERFORMANCE (MERIT) AND MARKET RANGES FOR SIMILAR POSITIONS. THERE ARE NO OTHER OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES RECEIVING COMPENSATION.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.RelationshipDescriptionTxt: JOHN BROWN IS PARK NATIONAL BANK'S DIVISION PRESIDENT.
BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: THE FOUNDATION HOLDS ASSETS MANAGED BY PARK NATIONAL BANK

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE L, PART IV, PART B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: JOHN BROWN IS ON THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF COMMUNITY HOSPITAL HEALTH SERVICES FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN THE EVENT THERE IS NOT A TIMELY BOARD MEETING FOR CONTEMPORANEOUS REVIEW, FORM 990 IS FORWARDED VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL OR U.S. MAIL TO EACH BOARD MEMBER FOR HIS/HER REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE. FORM 990 IS ALSO REVIEWED AND DISCUSSED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND/OR THE FINANCE COMMITTEE PRIOR TO FILING. BOTH COMMITTEES HAVE AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD TO DIRECT THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR TO SIGN AND TO FILE FORM 990.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHF REGULARLY AND CONSISTENTLY MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE WITH ITS CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY BY: 1) EACH PERSON NOMINATED TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES COMPLETES A CONFLICTS OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE CERTIFICATE; 2) ANNUALLY BY FEBRUARY 15, EACH TRUSTEE COMPLETES A CONFLICTS OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE CERTIFICATE; 3) A SUMMARY OF ALL CONFLICTS DISCLOSED BY TRUSTEES IS DISTRIBUTED TO ALL TRUSTEES AT THE APRIL QUARTERLY MEETING; 4) TRUSTEES WITH A CONFLICT RELATIVE TO SPECIFIC ITEMS OF DELIBERATION ARE ADVISED BY THE CHAIR TO REFRAIN FROM DISCUSSION AND VOTING OR ARE EXCUSED FROM THE MEETING IF THE CONFLICT IS MATERIAL; 5) THE CONTEMPORANEOUS MINUTES OF THE MEETING REFLECT THE NATURE OF THE CONFLICT AND THE FACT THAT THE MEMBER DID NOT PARTICIPATE IN DISCUSSION OR VOTING ON THE ITEM UNDER DELIBERATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF 3-4 DISINTERESTED MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES IS APPOINTED BY THE BOARD CHAIR. PROGRESS REPORT ON EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR GOALS IS REVIEWED, PERFORMANCE REVIEW SCORE SHEETS ARE COMPLETED INDIVIDUALLY BY MEMBERS, AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR PERFORMANCE IS REVIEWED AND COMPENSATION DETERMINED DURING A MEETING OF THE WHOLE COMMITTEE. COMPENSATION IS SET TAKING INTO ACCOUNT PERFORMANCE (MERIT) AND MARKET RANGES FOR SIMILAR POSITIONS. THERE ARE NO OTHER OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES RECEIVING COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MOST RECENT FORM 990 PLUS PRIOR TWO FISCAL YEARS' FORMS 990 ARE POSTED ON COMMUNITY HOSPITAL HEALTH SERVICES FOUNDATION WEBSITE. REQUESTS FOR A COPY OF THE FORM 990 FOR ANY FISCAL YEAR MAY BE MADE BY TELEPHONE, ELECTRONIC MAIL, U.S. MAIL OR IN PERSON. REQUESTS WILL BE HONORED WITHIN 5 WORKING DAYS. A NOMINAL CHARGE TO COVER THE COST OF COPYING MAY BE MADE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COPIES OF GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS MAY BE REQUESTED BY TELEPHONE, ELECTRONIC MAIL, U.S. MAIL OR IN PERSON; REQUESTS WILL BE HONORED WITHIN 5 WORKING DAYS. A NOMINAL CHARGE MAY BE MADE. AUDITED ANNUAL FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE ALSO AVAILABLE ON THE COMMUNITY HOSPITAL HEALTH SERVICES FOUNDATION WEBSITE.
COMMUNITY HOSPITAL HEALTH SERVICES FOUNDATION HAS NOT CHANGED ITS OVERSIGHT OR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR.
